name: PETSCII Lemmings
overview: Welcome to 'PETSCII Lemmings', a new Lemmings inspired game for the C64 and Plus/4. A game that was not only ported over by KO-KO, but the game contains many different screens of fun as you try to save as many Lemmings as possible to win each of the many levels provided. So yes if you loved playing Lemmings, and want to see what they would like developed in PETSCII make sure to check out PETSCII Lemmings!
